titles.title: I Will Sing Unto The Lord, For He Has Triumphed Gloriously

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I will sing unto the Lord, for He has triumphed gloriously
The horse and the rider are thrown into the sea (2x)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
The Lord my God, me strength and my song.
Now He is my victory. (2x)

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
The Lord is God and I will praise Him.
My father's God and I will exalt Him. (2x)

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Cantaré a Jehová en gloria el ha triunfado
Y ha echado al mar al ejército de Faraón

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
/El Señor mi Dios, mi fuerza y mi gozo
ha llegado a ser mi salvación/ (2)
El Señor es Dios, sí, yo le alabaré
Es Dios de mis padres yo le exaltaré
